idea-plugin.name: SerialVersionUID Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Automates the addition of missing serialVersionUID fields to Serializable classes. This plugin ensures compliance with Java serialization best practices, preventing runtime warnings and potential deserialization issues. Key features include:
  • Inspection for classes implementing or inheriting Serializable to identify missing serialVersionUID.
  • Quick-fix to generate unique serialVersionUID values automatically.
  • Handles complex inheritance scenarios, including interfaces that extend Serializable.
For more details, visit the GitHub repository.
